personal.name: Srinivas Sai
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
about: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with strong experience in Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, React, and CI/CD pipelines. Currently working at AscendSoft Private Limited, I have engineered over 30 RESTful APIs, automated deployments using Docker and GitHub Actions, and contributed to AI agent integration with intelligent frontend experiences.

I have also built a travel booking platform with backend APIs for cab, bus, and tour reservations, integrated Razorpay and Firebase for real-time payments and notifications, and streamlined deployments through CI/CD automation. In addition, I created a cultural fest registration platform optimized with caching, containerization, and high availability, ensuring scalability and performance under heavy load.

With a solid foundation in Java Full Stack, Cloud Computing, and Python, I am eager to contribute to building scalable backend systems, cloud-native applications, and innovative full stack solutions. My goal is to grow as a software engineer by solving complex problems and creating efficient, high-impact applications.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Engineered 30+ RESTful APIs using Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and RabbitMQ, enhancing backend efficiency and modularity.
Integrated multiple third-party APIs and services to expand platform functionality and improve user experience.
Automated deployments with Docker and GitHub Actions, cutting setup and release time by 50%.
Built and deployed AI agents using Spring AI, enabling advanced automation and intelligent system interactions.
Contributed to AI agent integration and Next.js frontend, enabling intelligent and interactive user experiences.

experience.title: Backend Intern
responsibilities: Created backend APIs for cab, bus, and tour bookings using Spring Boot, MySQL, and Redis.
Integrated Razorpay and Firebase FCM, enabling real-time payments and notifications with 99.9% delivery success.
Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions and Docker, cutting deployment time by 60% and boosting delivery speed.

projects.title: TravelApi
projects.description: Built a vehicle booking API for cab, bus, and tour services using Spring Boot, with MySQL for storage and Redis for caching to ensure high performance.

projects.title: BetterErp
projects.description: Developed a role-based academic ERP system with features for admin, faculty, and students using Spring Boot and React.

projects.title: FestEventAPI
projects.description: Created an event registration API for college fests, allowing students to register for events via a web interface. Built with Spring Boot for the backend, integrated Redis for caching, and used MySQL for data persistence. CI/CD enabled via GitHub Actions.
